argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcvexch.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |

| 3 |  | lcvexch.c | |- C = ( <oL ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lcvexch.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lcvexch.t | |- ( ph -> T e. S ) |
| 6 |  | lcvexch.u | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 7 |  | lcvexch.q | |- ( ph -> R e. S ) |
| 8 |  | lcvexch.d | |- ( ph -> T C_ R ) |
| 9 |  | lcvexch.e | |- ( ph -> R C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_lsssssubg | |- ( W e. LMod -> S C_ ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S C_ ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 7 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 6 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 5 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 15 | 2 | #P_lsmmod2 | |- ( ( ( R e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) /\ T C_ R ) -> ( R i^i ( U .(+) T ) ) = ( ( R i^i U ) .(+) T ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 13, 14, 8, 15 | #P_syl31anc | |- ( ph -> ( R i^i ( U .(+) T ) ) = ( ( R i^i U ) .(+) T ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_lmodabl | |- ( W e. LMod -> W e. Abel ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. Abel ) |
| 19 | 2 | #P_lsmcom | |- ( ( W e. Abel /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ( U .(+) T ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 14, 13, 19 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( T .(+) U ) = ( U .(+) T ) ) |
| 21 | 9, 20 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( ph -> R C_ ( U .(+) T ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( R C_ ( U .(+) T ) <-> ( R i^i ( U .(+) T ) ) = R ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( R i^i ( U .(+) T ) ) = R ) |
| 24 | 16, 23 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( R i^i U ) .(+) T ) = R ) |
